causes: policy-triggering ad copy (claims, sensitive attributes, before/after)
landing page non-compliance (missing disclosures, misleading content)
payment method or billing integrity issues
account trust issues (new BM, unusual activity, multiple rejections)
immediate_actions: confirm the exact enforcement type (restricted vs disabled vs rejected ads)
pause new ad edits and avoid repeated submissions
review last rejected ads and landing pages for policy triggers
verify business info, payment method, and domain consistency
submit one clean appeal with concise, factual language
mistakes: submitting multiple appeals in a short period
creating new accounts to bypass enforcement
editing ads/landing pages during review without documenting changes
running traffic to thin, misleading, or unsupported landing pages
prevention: use policy-safe copy patterns and avoid sensitive attribute phrasing
keep consistent business identity (domain, billing, business info)
warm up new accounts and avoid sudden spending spikes
maintain a rejection log and fix root causes before relaunch
use backup admin + verified BM structure (legitimate, not circumvention)
